Bulletin_Details.District: Jagatsinghpur (East and South-Eastern Coastal Plain Agroclimatic Zone)

Forecast_Up_To.Description: Dry weather may prevail over the district of Jagatsinghpur. The sky condition may remain clear to generally cloudy for the next five days. Wind speed will remain within 10-14 km/h. The daily maximum and minimum temperature are likely to remain 28-29°C and 18-19°C respectively.

Jagatsinghpur.Advisory: Post-emergence Weed Management: In transplanted and broadcasted paddy, spray Bispyribac Sodium 10% E.C. @ 80 ml/acre or Ethoxysulfuron 15% WDG @ 40g/acre at 3 to 4 leaf stage.
Bud Necrosis: To manage the carrier of Bud necrosis disease (Thrips), spray Neem Based Pesticide (Azadirachtin) 1500 PPM @ 600 ml/acre.

Aphid: To control aphids, spray Neem Based Pesticide (Azadirachtin) 1500 PPM @ 600 ml/acre. Then spray Thiamethoxam 25% W.G @ 40g/acre or Acetamiprid 20% S.P. @ 50g/acre or Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 60-ml/acre.
Alternaria Leaf Spot: To control Alternaria leaf spot disease, spray Mancozeb 75% WP @ 600g/acre or carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% WP @ 400g/acre.
Cut Worm: To control cut worm in potato crop, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5 % E.C @ 400 ml/acre.

Additional_Resources.OUAT_KALINGA_Products: Seedlings, Saplings & QPM, Tissue Culture Plants, Fruits & Vegetables, Value Added Products, Fingerlings/ Yearlings, Poultry chicks, Breeds, Mushroom & Spawn, Bio-Fertilizer, Bio-Pesticides, Vermi & VermiCompost, Farm Implements
